title: Available Page Rules settings
description: The different settings that Page Rules can apply to matching requests.
cfExtendedDescription: For more information on Page Rules, refer to [Page Rules](#page-rules).

links.title: Get available Page Rules settings
links.description: Returns a list of settings (and their details) that Page Rules can apply to matching requests.

properties.description: An object containing the setting properties such as the setting type or the list of supported values.

object_definition.title: Available Page Rules settings
object_definition.description: The different settings that Page Rules can apply to matching requests.
